biotools.summary:
new tool-kit for measuring planar polarized protein distributions and cell properties in developing tissues.

QuantifyPolarity, is a free software, capable of quantifying planar polarity and cell shape automatically in epithelia using comprehensive mathematical formulas. QuantifyPolarity provides image visualization, cell polarity and shape quantification services to students, scientists and other professional establishments around the world.
